system.requirements:
Tier 1; None
Aptitudes: Toughness, Defence, Nurgle
system.effect:
Gain +10 to resist effects of this type. GM may wish to approve or have choices justified by character's past or actions. Talent can be taken multiple times.
Types: Cold, Fear, Heat, Poisons, Psychic Powers, Radiation, Vacuum, Other.
